title: Weird Low queue?

replies.body: I'm not sure I totally understand what happened.  The patcher was repairing your game while loading into a match, or did the game crash then force a repair?  It sounds like it was long enough to cause a leave, but it's really important we get this fixed up.  Let me know if this is still an issue, any errors received, and what exactly happened.

LeaverBuster only issues punishments for a recent trend of left games.

[Don’t be a leaver. Don’t get busted.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)

http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-NQK9hbhYrw0/VFEulhu574I/AAAAAAAAbt4/aYoNyJIX7yM/s1600/bbviahri-banner_0.jpg
